attributes.action: To provide medical care to the civilian population caught in the Sudan civil war
attributes.additional_details: Over listening to the news quite frequently, a topic that is always discussed is the South Sudan War.
attributes.background: The innocent bystanders i.e. The General Public ultimately become victims of the civil war.

rejection.details:
The Department for International Development (DFID) is providing humanitarian aid to South Sudan, including for basic services such as health. You can find out more about DFID's aid budgets for South Sudan in 2018/19 and 2019/20 here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/723770/South-Sudan-July-2018.pdf

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
